website_summaries.verdict: A sausage stuffer that offers more versatility than other, more expensive options.
pros: Combination design offers effective meat grinding, sausage stuffing, and pasta making capabilities
Stuffer is adjustable with 3 different size settings
cons: The device can be difficult to hand wash in between uses when switching from meat to pasta

website_summaries.verdict: A budget-priced, manual grinder/mincer/pasta maker for occasional home use.
pros: Smaller production capacity than some competitors
Also a mincer and pasta maker
cons: Some concerns about long-term durability, especially when owners push machine beyond its capacity

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look like it will be all that sturdy but once I ...
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I buy this sooner? Doesn't look like it will be all that sturdy but once I started using it I fell in love. I ground up some chicken breast and made pesto meatballs which turned out great! I also liked the "lock,unlock" switch on the side which after a few minutes I realized was to suction the unit to the countertop. After that it was smooth sailing. Would definitely recommend and have already bragged about it to friends. I preferred this over a mixer attachment because once back in the box this item stores easily and minimally.
customer_reviews.author: Iheartbacon5440

customer_reviews.title: It looked so nice and well designed
customer_reviews.text: It was unable to grind 5 thin clean boneless pork chops. The unit would not stay put on counter. The white end piece by the blades kept coming off. I've owned several meat grinders in the past, this never happened before. This one made pink mush. It was too late to return the item so it was tossed into the trash. It looked so nice and well designed.. It might be okay for stuffing ground meat from the store into casings but not useful as a meat grinder. Spent several hours trying for success. I rarely write negative reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Honest John

customer_reviews.title: Why I found Food Residues on the supposed  to be brand new machine ?
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived yesterday afternoon. I opened the package today trying to assemble the machine and found out the white plastic spiral , steel disc and white plastic cover already in position. When I opened plastic cover, surprisingly found out some Food Residues on the steel disc. Did I get the returned item instead of brand new one ?
customer_reviews.author: aimin

customer_reviews.title: The product absolutely sucks - the section responsible for suction to help keep ...
customer_reviews.text: The product absolutely sucks - the section responsible for suction to help keep the grinder attached to the surface was broken after 1 use - and the unit can no longer be used. But, what sucks more is the customer service: if you try to email support@gideonproducts.com (email that they supply on the customer sheet for any questions or concerns) - they just ignore your email and never respond. Don't waste your money and time, DO NOT buy this.
customer_reviews.author: YK

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I love this little kitchen helper. It grinds all my fish, chicken an steak products. I was afraid that clean up would be problematic after reading some of the other reviews but it you are a hand dish washer like me and do not use an appliance... its a breeze. You simply dismantle. immerse in warm soapy water and wash. Simple. I hate buying processed meats for the family so this is a true God send. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine  B Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't going to leave a review but I think this product should be rated higher than it is. It works well for home use and does everything stated in the product description. Simple design but gets the job done. The base provides solid suction on a CLEAN AND FLAT surface. It will not grind through bone but who wants bone in your food anyway? The product is easy to disassemble and clean after disassembly. I am honestly not sure what other people are complaining about in so many of these negative reviews. Seems like mostly user error and generally unrealistic expectations for a product that is $25...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a horrible grinder. Wouldn’t even grind apples and cranberries. Threw it away after a half of a use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Auger crack issues
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to have issues with cracks in the auger piece of the unit. Two units from Amazon and one from the manufacturer each had the cracking issue in the auger piece. I have attached pictures of the third unit's crack. I believe this is a product manufacturing issue that needs investigation. All I can say is....check the auger for cracks.
customer_reviews.author: WillDue

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for my needs and no problems unless someone else decides to grind rocks, bones and metal with it.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried it for meat grinding and vegetable grinding. It works well in both cases. While plastic, it is durable for normal uses. These would be grinding meat, veggies, spices and similar things, and not metal, rocks and bones like some think it should be able to grind. You need industrial shredders for that so go elsewhere and quit complaining your inexpensive plastic grinder didn't work well on them. The fine mesh worked great for ham and the larger size worked well for salsa ingredients. Also, I think for ground beef, the larger size mesh would work better since the goal for that would likely be to help keep in juices when you make patties and meatloaf.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Used it once to grind sirloin roast into a nice hamburger. The meatballs I made were amazing
customer_reviews.text: Used it once to grind sirloin roast into a nice hamburger. The meatballs I made were amazing! Clean up was easy as most of the parts come apart to do this. Lightweight and stores easy as it is kinda small. Have not used the sausage making tools or tried to 'make pasta' with this device yet. Going to grind up some chicken breast next for recipes. never buying pre-ground meat again.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Morrison

customer_reviews.title: A HUGE disappointment!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of crap in my opinion. I tried to grind chicken thigh meat. Should have been with no issue as far as the description read. The suction wouldn't stay stuck to my counter so I was always sticking it back on. The grinder wouldn't grind pieces of chicken that I had cut up in small pieces. I had used a similar one when I was younger so I knew how to use it, but this thing was not like the sturdy silver one from my youth. The knob for the crank handle came off almost immediately. I used only the largest grinder but still no use even on soft chicken meat. Wow was it a HUGE disappointment!!!
customer_reviews.author: P Visser

customer_reviews.title: Less than desirable
customer_reviews.text: First I have to cut the chicken breast in to very tiny pieces in order to feed it through the grinder. Second, it's very difficult the clean the grinder. I was able to grind 2 chicken breasts, but it took a very long time. It got the job done at the end, but it requires A LOT OF MANUAL work. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: sjcoleman

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Awful product through and through. Crank handle does not properly screw itself to the grinder, the blade chews up the surrounding plastic which provides a contamination risk, and the spiral is essentially ineffective at pulling anything down and into the blade. I'm not brutal with my handling but the suction would lose its grip after about a minute of grinding chicken hearts. The cleaning is a nightmare and the fact that it cannot be removed from its suction base makes me worried for how clean it is. I threw it away after its second use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive grinder
customer_reviews.text: I used the grinder immediately when I got it to grind up the chicken for the dog food I make. I cooked the chicken first and cut it into 1/2 inch pieces. The grinder worked great. Only problem was the plastic handle came off the crank. I was able to fix it because it is affixed to the handle with a screw. I just got a small metal washer to put between the screw head and the plastic handle. Should stay put for now. Well worth getting. Easy to handle. Suction on my granite countertop is good too but did pop off once. Just need to hold it down somewhat when grinding gizzards.
customer_reviews.author: Kat D

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but takes a while to use
customer_reviews.text: It works but it takes a lot cranking to grind up meat. I ground up lunch meat for ham salad and it took along time to ground up 2 pounds. I also had to stop halfway through to clean it out and lot gets caught up inside of it. If I did more than just one or pounds on a rare occasion I would definelty have to get something else but for the occasional light use it works okay.
customer_reviews.author: Jonanthony Robinson

customer_reviews.title: OK product
customer_reviews.text: Machine worked brilliantly the first time to mince beef. The second time I tried sausage-making and the lock on the base wouldn't work. Didn't put too much pressure but we eventually managed to lock the base. However, as soon as we tried the sausage maker, the sausage tube stopper cracked open. I'm requesting for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper62

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work Well
customer_reviews.text: Does not seem to grind meat or veggies. The plates seem to mangle the food. Not satisfied with the quality. The screw to move food forward does not catch the food. Counter suction is very good. But effort needed to grind food was difficult. Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: stressalert

customer_reviews.title: Could not completely disassemble for washing , Would not grip counter top.
customer_reviews.text: This mincer would not grip to the counter top, I had to old it down with my hand. Also you would have to have a center table as the handle would not turn on a regular counter top, as it is too long. Also it would not completely disassemble for cleaning. I bought it 3 years ago and never used it until now. I knew I'd need it sometime!... So I was disappointed to come across these problems . I only had about half a pound of meat, but it worked quite well for that. However I would not recommend it to anyone due to the flaws I have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Jansail

customer_reviews.title: Yours Might Deserve Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product lost one star because it was broken when it arrived. It lost another because the instructions are so poorly printed that they are useless. The damage, most likely occurring while being assembled prior to being packaged, doesn't seem to be affecting its usability, for now. Unfortunately, I had destroyed the box prior to noticing the defects. Other than that, I am pleased with the ease of use and of cleaning. And it does stay put once it is locked onto my counter top. Basically a good product.
customer_reviews.author: earl

customer_reviews.title: Suffices
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to start making homemade sausage. So I bought this. It is ok and it works but any fatty tissue in meats/poultry really get stuck in the blades and then will not pass through the grinder. I ended up buying the kitchenaid grinder attachment and I love it. Since I have passed my timeframe of being able to return this item, it will be sold in a garage sale.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This little grinder far exceeded my expectations. It grinds meat with absolute ease. I really like the fact that its submersible. Lightweight but adheres to any smooth surface. Its great for home cooking needs. You don't have to fight this little grinder. Just lock it in place and you are all set. I don't have alot of strength in my hands and was able to operate it easily. If you like the idea of making your own ground meats, you should consider giving this a try. You won't regret it. It also makes great sausages! I would absolutely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SeaQ

customer_reviews.title: Nice little grinder
customer_reviews.text: The work bowl is small but for what I do, it is adequate. I make small batches of ground beef for burgers and meatballs. Grinding of the meat is easy and the unit seems to stay in place pretty good but the clean up effort is involved. Dis-assembly and washing the pieces, getting the stuck pieces out - this is probably the same level of effort for any grinder but is more than what I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bronx Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Does everything it claims to do.
customer_reviews.text: 3 minutes after opening the box, I was gleefully grinding a pork shoulder into sausage, which tasted better then the pre-prepared stuff sold at the stores. Pork shoulder is often available at $0.99/lb, so taking out the bone and grinding gives me sausage at about $1.20/lb, plus I can add pepper, sun dried tomato, spinach, or anything else I want to make it taste like $10/lb sausage. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: This product is lousy
customer_reviews.text: Practally everthing is wrong with this product. I tried to grind some pork with this and it would't do it. I ended up cutting it up by hand. I have usually had good luck with my purchases from Amazon, but this one was the pits. I missed my return date by a few days.
customer_reviews.author: snake

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Results for its Size!
customer_reviews.text: What a perfect grinder for when you need to grind up a smaller quantity of meat. My cat is loving the raw beef I grind up for her as a special treat. It has two stainless steel screen for fine or coarse mincing, three funnels for making sausage and can even make rigatoni and spaghetti.It works great for grinding fruit and vegetables as well. It stays put on the counter when you lock it down and is very easy to cleanup when done. Overall I am very pleased with this Kitchen Basics 3-In-1 Grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Is this one a fake grinder?
customer_reviews.text: I have a similar Grinder, which was great. This one looks like the copy of that one, but using very poor materials to make. The knife is very dull. Do not buy it. I will return it tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the price would have you believe
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit on the flimsy side and not made for heavy duty use, but it will grind your beef and stuff your skins just as well as you need it to. I bought it because for the price, it was a cheap way to decide whether I wanted to invest in a more expensive unit or if sausage making was just a fleeting hobby. Well years later, I'm still using it and have found no need to upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: K.H.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product purchased at a great price. I am now able to easily grind my own meat---whatever I may need, be it chicken, beef, lamb, pork, etc. and cleanup is very easy. It goes hold water under the suction cup base (which works excellently!), so I have learned to keep that part unsubmerged. Otherwise, it is absolutely great and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This product does a fair job of grinding small quantities of meat but there are a couple of annoyances that I gave it two stars : 1) the suction cup does not hold for very long. I was trying to grind two pounds of chicken breast and the device repeatedly came off the table. 2) the meat has to be cut in small pieces and the grinder cannot handle gristle or tendons very well. If I had to do it again I would invest more money and get a better product.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyBunny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Have an electric one at home but needed a small one for our mobile home. This one is perfect. Small, easy to use, and great results. Plus, the vacuum hold down works great on the Formica counter, especially with the convenient handle. Used it twice so far for ham salad. I cut the ham into small chunks for an easy grind.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The result was amazing. It minced the cook chicken in very small ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this meat grinder primarily to grind meat for my Pomeranian who recently lost majority of her teeth due to dental surgery. The result was amazing. It minced the cook chicken in very small pieces for her to easily digest. Great price for the task at hand. Thank you for making this a much easier task than I had expected. Definitely will keep an eye on future products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Matt & Patty

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for....
customer_reviews.text: I see why there are much more expensive grinders out there. This one did the job for what I needed but it held no suction so both of us had to work at it - one to hold, one to grind. The reservoir barely holds any meat. It was hard to clean. I wouldn't buy this again and instead spring for a better grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Aimcat

customer_reviews.title: Grinder is smaller than expected but works fine. My husband said when it went to clean ...
customer_reviews.text: Grinder is smaller than expected but works fine. My husband said when it went to clean it upon recieving it, there was food in it! I would have returned it based on that but he decided to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: organized chaos

customer_reviews.title: It will grind small chunks of meat okay but tossing in a hunk or even a few hunks as big as the container will hold is a bad ide
customer_reviews.text: This is decent. I wish I had spent the extra amount and bought a more heavy duty grinder though. This definitely won't grind through bone. It will grind small chunks of meat okay but tossing in a hunk or even a few hunks as big as the container will hold is a bad idea. I tried to grind through the muscle part of a kidney and it stalled completely. I had to take the whole thing apart to fix it. Also, grinding the crank gets really old really fast. I wouldn't buy it again but I guess it works okay enough to grind up meat for cat food.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Vanderblagen

customer_reviews.title: Great little kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: With only 2 of us large heavy duty appliances are a waste of money. This little gem grinds 2lbs. Of meat fast and easy, enough for juicy burgers and chilli with just a tiny bit of work. I wanted a pasta maker, another appliance my modest kitchen storage groaned at the though of, but this does it too! I cannot say how much we are enjoying this great little do it all, absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.author: lilibet

customer_reviews.title: Works well for grinding wet sprouted wheat
customer_reviews.text: Works well on wet sprouted wheat grains, much, much better than food processor or blender. Creates a dough-like paste, great for bread. Bonus: after a few successful uses, I misplaced the grinder blade (totally my fault). Contacted the distributor and was able to purchase a new one. Happily I’m back to baking sprouted wheat bread.
customer_reviews.author: mollyo

customer_reviews.title: Not totally useless but.....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the specific use of making sweet bell pepper relish. Unfortunately, the only way I could get the peppers and onions to grind was to cut them in approx one to two inch pieces. Any bigger and the feeder would not grab them and feed them to the chamber to the grinder. And the lock down feature was a joke. It would lock down...until you started using it! Once I cut the peppers into smaller pieces and held on to the grinder with one hand and turned the handle with the other, it did grind them up into the size I wanted....but was not the quick work I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Fireman21

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use. Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for Sausage Stuffing. The instruction to use is too simple. I spend a lot of time to fugue how it works. After three times use, the white plastic spiral is broken. Now I don't know what to do with this item. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lang Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Homemade Sausages
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make homemade sausages but didn't want to spend a lot of money just in case it was too difficult. This grinder/stuffer works amazingly. I was so surprised at how easy it was. I would recommend this product to anyone who wants to try their hand at making sausages. It was so much fun, I even surprised myself. I would recommend looking up sausage making videos on You Tube if you have never made them. But the machine worked much better than I expected. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Can't find ground pork
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, ground pork has become impossible to find and it is a critical ingredient in my meatballs. For the price, this seemed cheap enough to grind that 1/2 lb when I need it. And I can use any cut to get what I need.
customer_reviews.author: BLD

customer_reviews.title: Great electric meat grinder for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. The meat grinder is quite a powerful, compact, and has all the options I was looking for in a aplliance like this. Great value too. If you are considering purchasing one, VERY IMPORTANT to not wash any parts in the dishwasher, as it will cause the aliminium to oxidize, rendering it no longer usable for food preparation. Just read all the cleaning and maintenance instructions very thoroughly, and you will love this applience.
customer_reviews.author: LoveFiction

customer_reviews.title: Grind your own meat!
customer_reviews.text: Useful tool in the kitchen. Grind meat, spices, vegetables, or cheese together for meatballs, meat loaf or whatever, while knowing all ingredients are fresh. Clean food your way. Lived up to all the recommendations.
customer_reviews.author: PA Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Packaged very nicely. Instructions easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Packaged very nicely. Instructions easy to follow. Worked as advertised as I ground velvetta cheese and bacon to spread on English muffins and put under the broiler. It worked very well and taking it apart and cleaning it was a snap. Suction on the counter top was great. Have yet to try sausage, but that is next.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Aitken

customer_reviews.title: It actually worked better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I bought this meat grinder and got it today. I was so excited to use it and made ring bologna sandwich spread tonight. It actually worked better than I thought. I was easy to use and cleaned up wonderfully! For an inexpensive meat grinder, it is well made. I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: This is easy to assemble and appears to be sturdily made
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to assemble and appears to be sturdily made. The vacuum lock works very well so it shouldn't move no matter what you put through the grinder. It is handy to have a container to grind things in so you don't have to look for a dish the correct height. I can't speak to the pasta or sausage making features as I don't intend to use those. Although I didn't purchase this because of how it looks, it does look better than many other grinders I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Davis

customer_reviews.title: The suction cup does not qork
customer_reviews.text: The grinder does not have kitchen Basics written on it. Well. it does grind meat, but its a workout on your arms, which is alright for me. However, the suction cup doesn't work at all. I tried all the methods and it just won't work. So it takes 2 persons to operation. One holds the grinder, and the other turns the crank. This is very inconvenient. I regretted that I bought insurance for this item and found out it has quality issues on Day 1.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Nice little grinder!
customer_reviews.text: This grinder works quite well. I used the coarse plate first then ground again with the fine plate and it worked great. Suction onto the counter was very strong. Easy to clean. My only suggestion would be to include some kind of plunger to push the meat into the corkscrew. I would recommend this to anyone wanting to grind their own meat in small batches for that fresh ground taste.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want an electric grinder for fear of injuring myself on accident so this is the perfect hand-crank grinder. Easy to disassemble and put in the dishwasher to clean. Even though it's a hand crank, it's very easy to turn and gets every last piece of meat.
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Only gave it 4 stars because I haven't actually used it yet, but looked it over and put it together and like it very much. Had one similar to this, but this one is definitely of very good quality. I have no doubt it will do the job I purchased it for. I have since used the 3 in 1 meat grinder (for Thanksgiving meal) and just want to add that my husband said it worked very well. A really great purchase! I would now give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: JSinger

customer_reviews.title: My New Meat Grinder
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy using my new meat grinder. The grinder did a perfect job for the first time using it, to grind a piece of steak for hash. I was very pleased using this grinder and highly recommend this grinder.
customer_reviews.author: bluejlandscaper

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product to anyone! I tried to grind pickles with the biggest disc so my end result would be chunky and it was mush. Same on onions and hard boiled eggs. Every time I tried to do meat ( and I used small pieces) the screw on cap and blades would pop off. The plastic gasket on the handle leaked when I did the the pickles and onions. The suction on the base was great and the wrench used for tightening the base was also great. I was thoroughly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Okiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Great buy easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Small and did the job first meat grinder I've ever owned. I absolutely don't have any room for a large meat grinder which I am sure would be great to have. I am using this to grind meat for hamburger because I want to have more control over the meat used for ground meat. It is dishwasher safe cleaning is so simple. My one complaint is I couldn't get it to stick to my tile counter, which wasn't a big problem I think the more I use it the easier it will be.
customer_reviews.author: M E King

customer_reviews.title: It works great! Super easy to disassemble and clean
customer_reviews.text: This little guy has already made our money's worth. We make our own ground meat every year with deer and pork. Our friends grinder would not let us run the grounded meat through the grounder a second time. So the ground meat was chunky and I could not eat it that way. I bought this little guy to grind the ground meat a second time before cooking. It works great! Super easy to disassemble and clean. No hard to reach or get places. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Morales

customer_reviews.title: meat grinder Inferior product and membership account
customer_reviews.text: This product is not what I expected. It does not hold on the counter and is a very cheap plastics. I am very disappointed. Also I am very unhappy that my membership keeps being renewed and I cannot cancel it. I have two charges that I would like refunded $13.77 foe this months membership and $5.99 on my account today that I have no idea what it's for. Rosalie Peruchietti please contact so I can get this taken care of. The product was a meat grinder
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Peruchietti

customer_reviews.title: Powerful suction.  Will not budge!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. BOY WAS I SURPRISED. I think it holds better than the clamp on ones. the suction is amazing. I was missing a piece, and customer service fulfilled my replacement piece just like that!
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Impressed !
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed at how well this small grinder worked. Ground pork and beef to make sausages. I was pleased with the result.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dunnett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grinder, but suction may give out
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to grind meat for cat food. Needed to look at reviews and do a little guess work to assemble for the first time, but it worked very well and I was very happy with it until the base suction gave out. Only used it about 8 times. I can still use it but it's a lot more work. I'll try researching to see if I can just buy the base, but for the price I doubt they'll be selling spare parts.
customer_reviews.author: KMB

customer_reviews.title: On my second and will keep buying them
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I abused the last one till it fell apart and I love it! I make my cat food with it so a chicken a week goes through this little grinder bones and all. Lasts a little over two years. It's amazing for it's price.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: could not believe that this product could grind, stuff sausage and make pasta. tried two already, works great.
customer_reviews.author: andrew chase yngsdahl

customer_reviews.title: It  is absolutely too snall!  Falls apart  when used
customer_reviews.text: I did not like anything about this tiny food grinder, It just did not work!
customer_reviews.author: Cora Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Meat grinder
customer_reviews.text: This works well for what I needed it for. I make homemade dog biscuits, and requires a lot of meat chopping, so decided to try this. I was worried that it wouldn't work on cooked meat, but it does. Quite well, in fact. So yay!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Dewhurst

customer_reviews.title: The hopper is puny and it does not grind anything without great effort and then only very
customer_reviews.text: This is a toy and not meant for real grinding. There is no plunger. The hopper is puny and it does not grind anything without great effort and then only very, very slowly in very small amounts.
customer_reviews.author: Low lin2

customer_reviews.title: This product was only good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: This product was only good while it lasted. I only got to use it about 6 times. Mostly to make ground chicken since my local supermarket does not sell it. Now after minimal use the whole locking mechanism broke and is impossible to use anymore. Would have loved it if it was made of better material to make it more durable even if it meant paying more for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeury P.

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I grind a LOT of chicken breast. I've made pepperoni with it, ground up deer, etc. This thing is so easy on your arm and less of a hassle than kitchen aid attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: The product seemed used. It was sticky. I didnt use it immediately and just foud out today
customer_reviews.author: Donna Elizarde-Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I love this little grinder. The first one was given to me as a gift and just loved it. So easy to use and clean. This is my second one. I recently misplaced the blade for my first one. Emailed some company (info@gideonproducts.com, also support@gideon-products.com) whose name I found with my instructions to see if the blade could just replaced. Emailed twice but never rec'd an answer so I placed my order as I needed a grinder. Anita L. Howland AHowland24@comcast.net
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instant return
customer_reviews.text: This thing is garbage. You have to use it forever to get meat ground for even one burger and it jammed every time I used it
customer_reviews.author: Nlakat13

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it’s easy to assemble and use. The product is well made to do the options it is designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: R Hargenrader

customer_reviews.title: It’s really very very bad product, every time have a problem to put ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s really very very bad product, every time have a problem to put it together, even glued to the countertop. I had a similar meat grinder in a past, used it in 5 years and love it so much, however this brand is the worst I had
customer_reviews.author: skincare87

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work good. Had to purchase a wooden press separately so I wouldn’t grind my fingers
customer_reviews.author: Pat Burger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Before I purchased this grinder, I read reviews for it and a few similar products. Since the reviews were mixed, I decided to give it a try. It was easy to assemble and stick it my granite countertop quite well. I cut the pork into 1" cubes. It took less than 15 min to grind 5lb of pork. The meet was slightly froze, which makes it easier to grind. I really like it and don't have any negative things to say about it. I highly recommend this. Keep in mind the meet should be cut into cubes, not strips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is this a Toy???
customer_reviews.text: Sorry but this product is a joke. I feels and looks more like a toy. Very Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: hamptord

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: We used this to grind meat and onions for kebabs. Overall it worked very well and suctions strongly to the countertop. It did leak a bit and it would be great to have a pressing tool to push food products down into the grinder. Otherwise a great product, easy to assemble and disassemble for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This item is not strong enough to push the meat through the plastic grinder. The meat stops at the chamber and does not come out completely. It is very small and light. Not worth the money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I thought it would be!
customer_reviews.text: Much better then I thought! Made 2 lbs of ground chuck and bacon burgers, amazing! Never clogged - smooth operation -fairly fast. It never came loose from my counter top. There is just two of us so this is a great cheap option for me. Looking forward to making sausages next. Easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: Johnnystrom

customer_reviews.title: I wanted it for grinding peanuts for peanut bars. ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted it for grinding peanuts for peanut bars . it worked but it was very hard to use. The only other thing I would use it for is making ham salad. Hopefully that will work.
customer_reviews.author: lovedbyGod

customer_reviews.title: it ground pork and beef very easily. Easy to disassemble and clean
customer_reviews.text: A little late with this review, but I finally got around to using it. Thought out of the package this was going to break first time useing it, or it was to small. Used it and changed my mind, it ground pork and beef very easily. Easy to disassemble and clean. Will try the sausage making attachmen's soon.
customer_reviews.author: Zion

customer_reviews.title: I used it to make sausage and got the work done quickly and easily. The product quality is awesome considering its price
customer_reviews.text: The grinder works very well. I used it to make sausage and got the work done quickly and easily. The product quality is awesome considering its price.
customer_reviews.author: Astrion

customer_reviews.title: First time tortillas!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use, grinded corn to make tortillas and they turned out great!!!
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA LINTON

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Grounded some pork and Kobe trim. We keep the metal parts submerged in oil to prevent rusting. Haven't noticed any issues with cracking since the machine is plastic. Sturdy. Great for home use. Easy storage. Will come back to add pictures and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great price.
customer_reviews.text: I am on a baby food diet due to a chronic illness. This makes grinding my meat in preparation for pureeing a breeze. A nice surprise for the price that I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: food grinder
customer_reviews.text: received on time, as described, works fine...not as well constructed as I had hoped, but, satisfied...
customer_reviews.author: riviera

customer_reviews.title: Pefect
customer_reviews.text: This light weight meat grinder is perfect for my use. I don't use it every day, but when I want it, it is there. I did not need a large, expensive grinder and this is exactly what I was looking for. Economical and it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Moonyeen Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom. Used it for dumplings and wontons. She loves it. Although it might not be efficient as the electronic ones, it is enough to make meats for 2 meals of dumplings for 4 people before my mom got tired. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dannie

customer_reviews.title: Really helpful when stuffing sausage
customer_reviews.text: Stuffing sausage is much easier than before, it is 10 times as fast as stuffing sausage manually; I tried grinding meat, works excellent too; only thing I did not try is to make pasta, but I am already happy enough.
customer_reviews.author: White Water

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I have only used a couple of times. It is little, I like because it can be stored in any small space, but it is strong and can cut meat without any problems. I am not strong, and was really easy. I wanna try this weekend the pasta maker!
customer_reviews.author: jose luis

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little performer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little performer! It made short work of 1.5 lb of pork and the sausage funnel worked great! The pasta disk was tough to use but that may have been more about the consistency of the dough I used but I bought this for grinding meat and for that, it's a champ! Can't wait to experiment with more recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Convenient to store and use
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Convenient to store and use. So far have only used to grind meats and veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Violyn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tried this yet but I know it will be perfect. I use a meat grinder to grind up salt pork to use in minestrone soup. I haven’t had one for about 5 years and have tried everything to try to get the salt pork ground up fine enough.!!!! I’m a happy camper
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Compact and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy dandy little device that combines two or three needs into one compact and lightweight unit. It is smaller than I expected. Doesn't take up much space at all. Perfect for small in house projects, but I'm not running a restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer DiCamillo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Rarely do we find any item that actually overdelivers on promises. This one does, unexpectedly so. If you have a small grinding job to do and the food processor is inadequate for the task, this one does it well. Easy to use, easy to clean, well engineered, vacuum base excellent - pleasantly surprising in all respects. Unsurprisingly, I see price is increasing very quickly, already up almost 50%, but still inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Sandon

customer_reviews.title: I find it perfect for the infrequent meat grinding that I do.
customer_reviews.text: I infrequently grind meat to make pelmeni. Works great for that. Obviously it's not your grandmother's big old metal meat grinder with the 10" metal crank that clamped to the kitchen table. Understanding that, I give it 4 solid stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Dog

customer_reviews.title: Very good useful product
customer_reviews.text: This product works as expected. I bought this really to ground my own chicken for my toddler. But I have also used it to ground about 4 pounds of pork at one time to make dumplings. I am very satisfied with this product for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: eplur

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as good as the one i replaced and came on time.
customer_reviews.author: RossCo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use great price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use only problem I saw is there's nothing to push meat etc into the blades had to do it by hand not a great idea. Other then that works great
customer_reviews.author: zack

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. Perfect grinder for a starter
customer_reviews.text: It did its job. The more you use it the more you get a hang of it and clean up becomes easier. Lasted exactly 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: guillermo

customer_reviews.title: It works fine except for having to keep re-applying the suction
customer_reviews.text: Dummy me, for some reason I thought this was electric. It works fine except for having to keep re-applying the suction cup
customer_reviews.author: RUSSELL W.

customer_reviews.title: Small and mighty!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine works great! Perfect for what we needed. My husband actually used this to ground burger from venison. Did a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Collins

customer_reviews.title: I buy meat from smart and final and make bulk packages of meat for ...
customer_reviews.text: It really works well for what I need it for. I buy meat from smart and final and make bulk packages of meat for my family for tacos, ground meat. You can use it with different protein meats.
customer_reviews.author: Susana Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for average family use. Gets the job done and easy to disassemble and clean. Wouldn't recommend if you have pounds of meat to grind though. Haven't used the sausage or pasta attachment yet. Will do an update then
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Estevez

product_meta.title: Kitchen Basics 3 N 1 Manual Meat and Vegetable Grinder Mincer, 3 Size Sausage Stuffer, Pasta Maker Bowl Inluded
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteWith the Kitchen Basics Meat Grinder / Sausage Stuffer / Pasta Maker the possibilities are endless. Use it for grinding meat, vegetables, garlic, beans or garlic. It features an ergonomic and easy to turn handle. Just insert your meat, vegetables, etc. and grind it quickly and effortlessly. Grind beef for beautiful and delicious homemade hamburgers and sausages. Crush nuts, garlic vegetables, etc. Can also be used to finely mince or purée vegetables for baby food 

With your own grinder, you control the ingredients. You control your intake of fats, salts and other additives, for a healthier diet. Chunky sandwich spreads, savory appetizers, hearty soups, relishes, homemade sausage, other meat dishes, even cakes are so easy to make. And you can make sausages out of any food. Most butcher shops carry casings, which you should buy fresh, just before you plan to grind. 

Attaches to the table or countertop with a powerful suction cup. 

Sausage Stuffer 
Attach the sausage stuffer funnel and turn your meat into healthy and delicious homemade sausages. Comes with 3 sausage funnel sizes. 


Pasta maker 
Make your own homemade paste - Creates two pasta types; rigatoni and spaghetti. Just insert the dough; turn the crank and watch it turn into beautiful homemade pasta strands.
feature_bullets: Quickly and easily grind meat, vegetables, etc. Includes two stainless steel screens; fine mincing and course mincing plate
Attach the sausage funnel (3 sizes included) and impress your family and guests to healthy and delicious homemade sausages
Make your own homemade pasta - creates two pasta types rigatoni and spaghetti. Just insert the dough, turn the crank and watch it turn into beautiful homemade pasta strands
Dimensions: 7.5 in Height X 5 in Width; Quality sharp stainless steel blades
Easy to use and clean, Dishwasher safe
